question: Name the important tourist attractions in Teruel, Spain.
true_answer: Mausoleum of the Lovers of Teruel, El Torico, and Dinópolis.
asked_question_translated: Navedite pomembne turistične znamenitosti v mestu Teruel v Španiji.
answer: Pomembne turistične znamenitosti v mestu Teruel vključujejo Mudejarsko arhitekturo, kot so stolp San Martín, stolp San Pedro, stolnica Teruel ter Plaza del Torico.
answer_translated_eng: Important tourist attractions in Teruel include Mudejar architecture such as the San Martín Tower, San Pedro Tower, Teruel Cathedral and Plaza del Torico.
